title: Account hacking
body: My main account SquidBaIIs has been hacked. I submitted a ticket but I'm worried that it will get thrown aside since I don't even know what the email address I used for the signup is. Just that it was an assigned college email from 5 years ago. How long does this usually take for a response? I do have a card connected to the account but since the email wasn't verified they won't have the Cvv code for it.

replies.body: We won't throw you aside, and our account team will do our best to assist you.  It is important though that we are able to reply back to you directly, so if you used the ticketing center it may be going to a different address.  You'll want to use the [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) which allows you to input your own email address we can reply to directly, or email us via support@riotgames.com.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
